name: shinmegamitensei
description: Play a modified version of Shin Megami Tensei that runs in Red
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data provided by users for the express purpose of redisplaying. It does not store user data which was not provided through a command. Users may remove their own data without making a data removal request. This cog does not support data reqeusts, but will respect deletion requests
install_msg:
Welcome to the Velvet room. Thank you for installing Shin Megami Tensei: Red.
To begin, type `[p]shinmegamitensei register`
author: Amy (jojo7791)
